code: @Override protected int poll() throws Exception {     Exchange exchange = endpoint.createExchange().     try {         // send message to next processor in the route         getProcessor().process(exchange).         // number of messages polled         return 1.     } finally {         // log exception if an exception occurred and was not handled         if (exchange.getException() != null) {             getExceptionHandler().handleException("Error processing exchange", exchange, exchange.getException()).         }     } }
